attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am not a citizen, but of British descent.
This seems the only way to contact the Prime Minister as his mail has been out of commision for "maintenance" since 23 June. Must be using Microsoft rubbish - change to SuSE Linux.
Anyway, I wrote airmail to 10 Downing Street on 5 June and have not received a respone. Two previous PM's responded by return mail.

rejection.details: Please note as stated on the epetition's registration form that you have to be a British Citizen to participate on this forum.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
